articles.author: Ravi Kant
articles.title: US, China once had rare-earth aces in the hole but the US folded - Asia Times
articles.description: “The Middle East has oil," Deng Xiaoping is reported to have remarked. "China has rare earths." Deng was visiting one of China's biggest rare earths
articles.content:
The Middle East has oil,” Deng Xiaoping is reported to have remarked. “China has rare earths.”
Deng was visiting one of China’s biggest rare earths mines, in Baotou, Inner Mongolia, in 1992 when he … [+7103 chars]
